Pre-Game Insights: Memphis Grizzlies coach Taylor Jenkins started Zach Edey to anchor a frontline featuring Jaren Jackson Jr. and Santi Aldama against the Chicago Bulls.
Post-Match Reflections: Edey hasn't gained Jenkins' trust yet, particularly when games get tight in the second half.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zach Edey played 14 minutes on Monday against the Chicago Bulls, five of which came in the second half.
The Memphis Grizzlies won the game 124-111 against the Orlando Magic on Saturday.
